alert.note: Alert for Estill (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 03 at 7:38AM EST until January 04 at 5:24AM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kentucky... Kentucky River near Ravenna affecting Estill County. .The river has crested at Ravenna and will continue to slowly fall. For the Kentucky River...including Whitesburg, Hazard, Jackson, Oneida, Booneville, Heidelberg, Ravenna...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM THIS MORNING THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Kentucky River near Ravenna. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 31.0 feet, Major flooding occurs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 AM EST Monday the stage was 29.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:15 AM EST Monday was 30.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this evening and continue falling to 15.0 feet Friday evening. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 30.2 feet on 02/07/2004. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued by 5 PM EST.
